caption.p: Immunohistochemistry analysis of viral tissue distribution. (A) Different tissues as indicated were fixed, sectioned, and stained with mouse monoclonal antibodies (1:500) to PRV gE, and the arrows show the positive signals for PRV in the tissues (400Ã— magnification). (B) The IHC scores of PRV antigen were analyzed by calculating the number of gE positive positive cells. Asterisk indicates a significant difference, * P < 0.05; ** P < 0.01; *** P < 0.001.
